pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, January 14, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, January 14, 2016:

Waterloo

8:30 a.m. – The Prime Minister will tour Velocity and make an announcement.

Needles Hall
University of Waterloo
200 University Avenue West,
Waterloo, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


Waterloo

9:30 a.m. – The Prime Minister will visit Blackberry’s head office.

Closed to media


Kitchener

10:30 a.m. – The Prime Minister will open the Google Canada Development Headquarters and will hold a media availability.

Google Canada Development Headquarters
51 Breithaupt Street,
Kitchener, Ontario


PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
